SCRIPT.MSCRI:
: DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string, 30 : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER
: INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH
!----------------------------------------------- Parameter validation --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Protocol" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_PUP_MASTER_PRTCL# : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Server Name" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_PUP_MASTER_SERVER# : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Port" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_PUP_MASTER_PORT# : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION
!------------------------------------------ Buidling Puppet install agent command -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
: SET &UC4RB_PUP_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_PUP_MASTER_SERVER# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_PUPPET_PUPPET.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE
: SET &BASE_URL# = "&UC4RB_PUP_MASTER_PRTCL#://&UC4RB_PUP_ESCAPED_STRING#:&UC4RB_PUP_MASTER_PORT#"
: SET &UC4RB_PUP_CMD# = "curl -k &BASE_URL#/packages/current/install.bash -w '%{http_code}' | sudo bash"
: PRINT &UC4RB_PUP_CMD#
! Invoking command &UC4RB_PUP_CMD#
!------------------------------------------ Error Handling -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Status messages : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** INSTALL AGENT UNIX ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** INSTALL AGENT UNIX ACTION FAILED ********"
! Check error level execcode=$? if [ "$execcode" -eq "0" ] ; then : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO else : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR exit $execcode fi
: INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_FOOTER
